external_references.description: Hamzeloofard, S. (2020, January 31). New wave of PlugX targets Hong Kong | Avira Blog. Retrieved April 13, 2021.

description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129)'s [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) variant has created a hidden folder on USB drives named RECYCLE.BIN to store malicious executables and collected data.(Citation: Avira Mustang Panda January 2020)
